pos_mean_info_list.mean: 缺席的；缺少的；心不在焉的；茫然的
旷工；旷课；有计划的怠工；经常无故缺席

word_mean_info__list.difference: 指不足，但侧重达不到规定的，需要的或已知应有的数量。
指某物根本不存在或完全短缺，或某人虽存在，但未到现场。
指产量不足或缺乏某物难以应付或满足需要。
普通用词，指部分或完全的不足。
指完全或短缺某物，侧重缺少之物是必需的东西。使用范围比lack窄些。

word_group.phrase: absence makes the heart grow fonder

word_group.brief_definition: (本应在场)因缺席而招人注意

bilingual.source: The absence of precedents made the case particularly challenging.
bilingual.target: 缺乏先例使得这个案件特别具有挑战性。

bilingual.source: Its absence might suggest a lack of warmth in interpersonal relationships.
bilingual.target: 它的缺失可能意味着人际关系中缺乏热情。
老鼠尾巴，整体缺乏毛发。

bilingual.source: The absence of clues baffled the police.
bilingual.target: 缺乏线索使警察当局受阻。

bilingual.source: Absence of abet from colleagues in your work.
bilingual.target: 工作上缺乏同事的支持.

bilingual.source: People will stifle in the absence of air.
bilingual.target: 缺乏 ，使得每个人都频频吸气。

bilingual.source: The absence of such vitamin makes poor health.
bilingual.target: 缺乏这种维生素会使人生病。

bilingual.source: In the absence of evidence, the suspect was released.
bilingual.target: 因缺乏证据，那个嫌疑犯被释放了。

yingyinNormal.en: In your absence? We wait on Father.
yingyinNormal.zh: 而你却没参加吗？我们在等父皇。

yingyinNormal.en: As I've explained, the absence of my friends does not cause me pain.
yingyinNormal.zh: 如我所言，我朋友不在并不能使我悲伤。

yingyinNormal.en: I take his absence as agreement to the orders of the divorce. Let's proceed.
yingyinNormal.zh: 不出庭即视为接受离婚。

yingyinNormal.en: This is the story I told our parents to spare them further pain, and to account for the absence of an identifiable body.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我就这么告诉我们父母，好让他们不再痛苦。也能解释一具特征明显的尸体为什么不见了。

yingyinNormal.en: The Reflecting Absence memorial and museum honors the 3000 people who lost their lives on that darkest of September days.
yingyinNormal.zh: 纽约世贸中心遗址纪念馆旨在为那年九月最黑暗一天失去宝贵生命的人致敬。

yingyinNormal.en: When an honest man says nothing, you see his heart. I don't question his loyalty to you, but an absence of words speaks loudly.
yingyinNormal.zh: 当光明磊落之人缄口不言，你便能看穿他，我不是在质疑他对你的忠诚，但一切尽在无言中。

yingyinNormal.en: You'll have to devise a scenario that plausibly explains my absence, keeping in mind that the key to a good lie lies in the details.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你得自己设计个情节，合理地解释我的不在场，要记得，说谎的秘诀在于善于编织细节。

yingyinNormal.en: A pill? Well, when the psychiatrist told me I had to take a leave of absence because I yelled at my boss I started to get worked up again.
yingyinNormal.zh: 药丸？医生说我对上司大吼大叫，所以应该请假，我又开始暴跳如雷。

yingyinNormal.en: Where's Howard? He took the day off. Oh, let's take advantage of his absence and tell the kinds of jokes only physicists get. I'll go first.
yingyinNormal.zh: 霍华德人呢？他请一天假。那我们快把握他不在的机会。多说一点只有我们物理学家才懂的笑话。我先来。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 外出；不在；缺乏；缺席；不存在；外出期
adv. 心不在焉地；茫然地

word_family.mean: adj. 不在的；缺席的；走神的；心不在焉的；缺少的

examination_example.sentence: In the <highlight>absence</highlight> of work, a society designed with other ends in mind could disturb strikingly different circumstances for the future of labor and leisure.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在没有工作的情况下，一个为其他目的而设计的社会可能会为未来的劳动和休闲创造截然不同的环境。

examination_example.sentence: This same <highlight>absence</highlight> of moral purpose was wounding companies such as News International, she thought, making it more likely that it would lose its way as it had with widespread illegal telephone hacking.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 她认为，这种同样的道德目标缺失正在损害新闻国际集团这样的企业，使其更有可能迷失方向，正如其在普遍的非法电话窃听事件中一样。

examination_example.sentence: It's increasingly apparent that the <highlight>absence</highlight> of purpose, of a moral language within government, media or business could become one of the most dangerous goals for capitalism and freedom.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 越来越明显的是，政府、媒体或企业内部目的和道德语言的缺失可能成为资本主义和自由最危险的目标之一。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 外出；不在；缺乏；缺席；不存在；外出期

word_family.mean: adj. 不在的；缺席的；走神的；心不在焉的；缺少的

examination_example.sentence: They embarked on a series of nine experiments testing people's enjoyment in the presence or <highlight>absence</highlight> of a camera.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们进行了一系列九个实验，测试人们在有或没有摄像头的情况下的快乐程度。

examination_example.sentence: Whether the <highlight>absence</highlight> of physical currency causes a person to spend more.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 实物货币的缺失是否会导致一个人花费更多。

examination_example.sentence: Whether the <highlight>absence</highlight> of physical currency is going to affect everyday life.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 实物货币的消失是否会影响日常生活。

examination_example.sentence: Researchers at Duke University scrutinized more than 160 published studies and found an <highlight>absence</highlight> of strong evidence.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 杜克大学的研究人员仔细审查了160多项已发表的研究，发现缺乏有力的证据。

sense_info_list.en: the state of being away from a place or person

examination_example.sentence: Exercise caution about the use of <highlight>absence</highlight> claims.
But the most conspicuous omission may well be the <highlight>absence</highlight> of India's farmers.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但是最明显的遗漏可能是印度农民的缺席。

examination_example.sentence: When the <highlight>absence</highlight> of any one doesn't affect the relationship.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 任何一个人的缺席都不影响关系的时候。

examination_example.sentence: Its <highlight>absence</highlight> might suggest a lack of warmth in interpersonal relationships.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它的缺失可能意味着人际关系中缺乏热情。

examination_example.sentence: In the <highlight>absence</highlight> of the cultural traditions that fill our lives with numbers from infancy, we would struggle with even basic quantitative distinctions.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果缺乏婴儿时期的数字文化传统，那么我们连最基本的数量区分都会很吃力。
